tasks.label: Release
tasks.command: g++ -Ofast  -flto -march=native -funroll-loops -g -std=c++20 -Icommon -Itokenizer -Iparser -Icode_gen main.cpp code_gen/*.cpp common/*.cpp parser/*.cpp tokenizer/*.cpp -o fasm.exe

tasks.label: Debug
tasks.command: g++ -g -std=c++20 -Icommon -Itokenizer -Iparser -Icode_gen -DPRINT_TOKENS_LABELS -DPRINT_INSTRUCTIONS main.cpp code_gen/*.cpp common/*.cpp parser/*.cpp tokenizer/*.cpp -o fasm_debug.exe
